name: Netsuite Inbound Event - Salesforce Outbound Event & Order
description:
When there is a           New or updated custom record
          in NetSuite
, search for objects in Salesforce and other actions

code.name: updated_custom_object
code.title: New/updated Inbound Event
code.description: New or updated Inbound Event in NetSuite

block.name: search_sobjects
block.title: Search Outbound events
block.description: Search for Outbound events in Salesforce

block.name: update_sobject
block.title: Update Outbound event

extended_input_schema.name: id
extended_input_schema.label: Outbound Event ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Salesforce internal ID of Outbound Event to update

block.comment: Update OE with Netsuite inbound event  publishing status and error message, if any

block.name: declare_variable
block.title: Create variable error_message
block.comment: by default, use the custom error field (in case the error block is not formatted as expected)

input.sample_document:
{
   "type":"error.SuiteScriptError",
   "name":"USER_ERROR",
   "message":"You must enter at least one line item for this transaction.",
   "stack":[
      "anonymous(N/serverRecordService)",
      "createSO(/SuiteScripts/Transaction/Sales Order/Process Inbound SO/create_SO_from_Event.js:106)",
      "afterSubmit(/SuiteScripts/Transaction/Sales Order/Process Inbound SO/create_SO_from_Event.js:39)"
   ],
   "cause":{
      "type":"internal error",
      "code":"USER_ERROR",
      "details":"You must enter at least one line item for this transaction.",
      "userEvent":"aftersubmit",
      "stackTrace":[
         "anonymous(N/serverRecordService)",
         "createSO(/SuiteScripts/Transaction/Sales Order/Process Inbound SO/create_SO_from_Event.js:106)",
         "afterSubmit(/SuiteScripts/Transaction/Sales Order/Process Inbound SO/create_SO_from_Event.js:39)"
      ],
      "notifyOff":false
   },
   "id":"",
   "notifyOff":false,
   "userFacing":false
}

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.comment: wrap this in an error block in case the error message is not formatted correctly

block.comment: See if there is a user friendly error message for the exact error

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.comment: If there was a match for the error, save it as the error message we will return to the user

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry

extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.name: update_variable

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.comment: edit the status to use either the user friendly error message (if one was found) or the exact error message from NetSuite
